alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...An isolated dry thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kit Carson County through 530 PM MDT... At 443 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an isolated thunderstorm near Seibert, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. Dangerous cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Cloud to ground lightning could initiate wildfires. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Vona around 500 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Stratton. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 399 and 427. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
